reviewText: This DVD is TOO outdated. I'm law enforcement and I would NOT recommend this DVD for civilian to relay LEGAL STAND and justification. I CAN only recommend to use this DVD to practice the DRAW of your weapon, BUT NOT for legal stand.

This is a great video for introducing the public to the snap decisions an officer must make in a violent and possibly deadly situation.  It allows the viewer to try to make the same decisions to see if they would shoot, don't shoot, or die from a bad decision or being too slow to decided.

This is an excellent video to introduce the public to the snap decisions an officer must make in a violent and life threatening situations. It allows the viewer to try the same decisions and see whether they would shoot, don't shoot, or die making a bad decision or being too slow to decide.
